radiographic_examinations.findings: The lungs are clear. The liver is unremarkable. The gallbladder is unremarkable. The pancreas is unremarkable. The spleen is unremarkable. The adrenal glands are unremarkable. The right kidney is markedly atrophic. The unenhanced left kidney is unremarkable. No small bowel obstruction or ascites. The appendix is dilated with surrounding inflammation and contains a fecalith. No focal fluid collection. No pelvic free fluid. A few prominent lymph nodes are noted in the right lower abdomen, likely reactive. No aggressive bone lesions. There is minimal anterolisthesis of L5 on S1.
